entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
